abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile talks about
            financing farmers and strengthening Georgia's rural
            development. As a part of an effort backed by the World Bank
            to boost development of farming in the country, the line of
            credit was offered to farmers around Georgia to make it
            easier for them to expand production. The conditions offered
            under the project offered farmers an opportunity to get
            loans with good interest rates. Cattle and dairy farmers,
            greenhouse owners, orchard growers and others have obtained
            credit on interesting terms through the program. Defaults
            were less than one percent. With help from the line of
            credit, Georgia's farmers, agri-business owners and
            food processors boosted production, exports and the livelihoods.
